EmailTemplate.name: RE: Turbonomic Introduction for June/July (1498664249.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Turbonomic Introduction for June/July (1498664249.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 David – Following up from our brief conversation last month, I wanted to see if you would you be interested in hearing about a platform that allows you to grow both your on-premise infrastructure and cloud environments in the most cost effective way possible? Turbonomic’s control platform allows infrastructure teams continue to grow out and scale their on-premise infrastructure by using automation to ensure that each workload is getting the resources it needs in real time, while also giving you cost insight into your public cloud investments. With the 5.9 release, Turbonomic can help you break down which templates are the most cost effective for spinning up workloads in a public cloud like AWS or Azure. Our customers use the automation to not only increase workload performance, but to also increase the efficiency of their infrastructure. Because of this they are able to spend significantly less on hardware year over year. BMC CIO, Scott Crowder Talks Turbonomic - Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> From what I know about the complexity of Akerman’s infrastructure, I am confident you will find our product valuable. David, do you have 30 minutes for my engineering team and I to provide an introduction to see if this is something that could be beneficial to you and the team at Akerman? Best, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, May 22, 2017 2:00 PM To: 'david.wimberly@akerman.com' <david.wimberly@akerman.com> Subject: Turbonomic Introduction for June/July Hi David, Thanks for taking the time to speak with me today. If the project you are about to start involves a data center migration, hardware refresh or any other type of virtualization don’t hesitate to reach out as Turbonomic’s capacity planner has helped companies like HPE and BMC to save millions on hardware as they pursue these projects. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> Turbonomic does this by forecasting “what-if” scenarios to more accurately predict exactly how much hardware you will need for the project. If this is relevant please don’t hesitate to reach out.
